title: Best Abu Dhabi hotels with rooftop restaurants
excerpt: Discovering hotels in Abu Dhabi with rooftop restaurants can be a daunting task, as the city is filled with numerous luxurious options. This list narrows down the best venues that not only offer stunning dining views but also provide a memorable experience, making it easier for travelers to find the perfect spot to unwind and enjoy the skyline. Whether you're looking for a romantic dinner or a vibrant social scene, these selections will elevate your stay in the capital of the UAE.
intro: Uncover the ultimate list of Abu Dhabi hotels that boast breathtaking rooftop dining experiences, perfect for any traveler seeking luxury and stunning views.

hotels.name: Shangri-La Hotel Apartments Qaryat Al Beri
hotels.description: Experience the opulence of Shangri-La Residences Qaryat Al Beri, where each elegantly decorated room features stunning Arabic architecture, a balcony with views, a kitchenette, and complimentary Wi-Fi. Savor exquisite dining options, including Chinese, French, and Vietnamese cuisine, unwind by the rooftop pool, or indulge in a relaxing treatment at CHI, The Spa. Ideally situated near Abu Dhabi's private beach and iconic attractions like Sheikh Zayed Mosque, this hotel promises a luxurious escape.
hotels.highlight: Offers a rooftop pool and diverse dining options, including a rooftop restaurant with stunning views of Abu Dhabi.

hotels.name: Sofitel Abu Dhabi Corniche
hotels.description: Discover unparalleled luxury at Sofitel Abu Dhabi Corniche, where breathtaking seafront views and lavish comfort set the stage for an unforgettable getaway. Delight your palate at six exceptional dining venues, including the Michelin-selected Silk & Spice, and rejuvenate at the opulent spa and fitness center. Enhance your stay by booking a club room or suite to enjoy exclusive access to Club Millésime, featuring daily refreshments and gourmet snacks.
hotels.highlight: Offers a rooftop restaurant with stunning sea views and six exceptional dining venues, including the Michelin-selected Silk & Spice.

hotels.name: Fairmont Bab Al Bahr
hotels.description: Experience a luxurious escape at Fairmont Bab Al Bahr, an Art Deco beach hotel nestled in Abu Dhabi's lively atmosphere. Enjoy a private beach, two outdoor pools, and a variety of dining options, including the renowned CuiScene, all while relishing in the comfort of elegantly appointed rooms with modern amenities. With personalized concierge services and a well-equipped conference space, this hotel is ideal for both relaxation and business.
hotels.highlight: Offers a rooftop restaurant with stunning views and culinary delights at CuiScene, alongside a private beach and outdoor pools.
hotels.location: Between The Bridges, Khor Al Maqta

hotels.name: W Abu Dhabi - Yas Island
hotels.description: Experience unparalleled luxury at W Abu Dhabi - Yas Island, featuring a full-service spa, two outdoor pools, and a state-of-the-art fitness center for ultimate relaxation and recreation. Savor international cuisine at the on-site restaurant, unwind at the multiple bars, or enjoy 24-hour room service for your convenience. Ideally located with a complimentary beach shuttle and modern business facilities, this Art Deco hotel is perfect for both leisure and business travelers looking for a memorable stay.
hotels.highlight: Boasts a rooftop garden restaurant offering stunning views and international cuisine complemented by luxurious spa and fitness facilities.

hotels.name: Four Seasons Hotel Abu Dhabi at Al Maryah Island
hotels.description: Discover the epitome of luxury at the Four Seasons Hotel Abu Dhabi at Al Maryah Island, where your comfort is our priority. Indulge in a rejuvenating spa experience, savor exquisite American cuisine at Butcher & Still, and enjoy a vibrant poolside bar. With a stunning outdoor pool, a well-equipped health club, and attentive services, your perfect escape in Abu Dhabi awaits.
hotels.highlight: Offers a stunning rooftop terrace with exquisite dining options and a full-service spa for ultimate relaxation.

hotels.name: Conrad Abu Dhabi Etihad Towers
hotels.description: Discover the epitome of luxury at Conrad Abu Dhabi Etihad Towers, where a private beach complements your sophisticated retreat. Indulge in a full-service spa, unwind by one of three stunning outdoor pools, and delight in exceptional dining at 12 diverse restaurants. With extensive event facilities and top-notch amenities, this hotel is perfect for both relaxation and business needs.
hotels.highlight: Boasts a rooftop restaurant with stunning views, a private beach, and a full-service spa for ultimate relaxation.

faqs.question: What are the average prices for hotels in Abu Dhabi with rooftop restaurants?
faqs.answer: Prices for hotels in Abu Dhabi with rooftop dining can vary widely depending on the season and hotel category. On average, expect to pay between 600 to 1,200 AED per night for mid-range to luxury hotels that feature rooftop restaurants, with higher rates during peak tourist seasons.

faqs.question: Which hotels in Abu Dhabi offer the best views from their rooftop restaurants?
faqs.answer: Hotels such as the Jumeirah at Etihad Towers and the Sofitel Abu Dhabi Corniche offer stunning panoramic views of the city skyline and the Arabian Gulf from their rooftop venues. Both hotels are known for their high-quality dining experiences and breathtaking sunset views.

faqs.question: Are rooftop restaurants in Abu Dhabi open year-round and do they have any dress codes?
faqs.answer: Most rooftop restaurants in Abu Dhabi are open year-round, but it's always best to check with the hotel for specific seasonal closures. Many places enforce a smart-casual dress code, so be prepared for a more upscale dining experience when you visit.

faqs.question: How can I find the best deals on hotels with rooftop dining in Abu Dhabi?
faqs.answer: To find the best deals on hotels with rooftop restaurants, consider booking directly through the hotel’s website and signing up for newsletters for exclusive offers. Additionally, using hotel comparison websites and booking during off-peak seasons can lead to significant savings.

faqs.question: What amenities should I expect when staying at a hotel with a rooftop restaurant in Abu Dhabi?
faqs.answer: Hotels with rooftop restaurants typically offer a range of amenities including pools, spas, and fitness centers. Expect complimentary Wi-Fi, concierge services, and in some cases, access to exclusive lounges, enhancing your overall experience during your stay.
